data.title: test 预测-04
data.code:
var data = [ ['30', 11.35], ['01', 85.11], ['02', 36.61], ['03', 27.26], ['04', 6.72], ['05', 36.37], ['06', 80.13], ['07', 20.88], ['08', 97.15] ]; data.push(['预测', avg]) var sum = 0; var data3 = []; for (var i = 0; i < data.length - 1; i++) { data3.push(data[i][1]) sum += data[i][1] } var avg = sum / data.length; var myRegression = ecStat.regression('polynomial', data); var data1 = myRegression.points.sort(function(a, b) { return a[0] - b[0]; }); var data2 = []; for (var i = 0; i < data.length - 1; i++) { data2.push('') } data2.push(data1[data1.length - 1][1]) //======= x轴=========== var data4 = []; for (var i = 0; i < data.length; i++) { data4.push(data[i][0]) } option = { backgroundColor: '#000', tooltip: { trigger: 'axis', formatter: function(params) { if (params.length === 1) { if (params[0].seriesName === 'bar1') { return '明天
' + params[0].data; } else { return params[0].axisValue + '日
' + params[0].data; } } else { return params[0].axisValue + '日
' + params[0].data; } } }, xAxis: [{ type: 'category', name: '日', data: data4, splitLine: { show: false, }, }], yAxis: { type: 'value', splitLine: { show: false, } }, grid: { top: 90 }, series: [{ name: 'bar', type: 'bar', barGap: '-100%', data: data3, itemStyle: { color: '#ff0' }, xAxisIndex: 0 }, { name: 'bar1', type: 'bar', itemStyle: { color: '#000', shadowColor: '#f00', shadowBlur: 10 }, data: data2, xAxisIndex: 0 }] };
